answers.answer: i really need an answer to this please help me
It means they felt the blood test they ran was within normal range.

HiWelcome to the forum!It basically means that all the results were within normal limits or if they were outside the limit, the range was clinically insignificant. So relax. Everything is fine lab wise. If you have any other concerns you want to share, please feel free to do so.Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
so there could be something wrong in the future

HiFuture no one can speak about for sure. However if a particular set of lab investigations are within normal limits today, there is no reason why they will not continue to be so tomorrow or in future. However if it is related to some disease, then there can be fluctuations depending on the control of the disease like diabetes, hypothyroidism etc.Until and unless you have symptoms one should be concerned about, do not worry. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: what does it mean if a blood test comes back as satisfactory
title: blood test
